page.title: 06INTERVIEW WITH A WORKER
page.content: 5. What was your job at the works? {I had to drive trucks into the quarry, {or "nut hole" to collect the clay. One {of them is where Stewartby lake is. {This carried on for a good few years, {then after my accident, hurting my {back, I was transferred to {maintenance in the sheds, where I had {to fix the machines.} 6. What happened to you in the accident? {A crane caught me in the quarry and {hit my back. It took me about two {months to get better.} 7. What time did you get up? {Very early, about 5.30 every morning. {I left at 6.00am on my bike. I never {had a car.} 8. Do you know of anyone else who worked there? {Of course! Nearly everyone was a {farmer or brickworker.
